data.title: Margaret Franklin Ramsue Scott
data.meta_description: Margaret Franklin Ramsue Scott, 63, affectionately known as Frankie, entered into eternal rest on Saturday, August 3, 2024, surrounded by her family at...
data.text:
Margaret Franklin Ramsue Scott, 63, affectionately known as Frankie, entered into eternal rest on Saturday, August 3, 2024, surrounded by her family at Iredell Memorial Hospital. She was born in Iredell County on December 29, 1960, to the late James Franklin Ramsue and Josephine Rosebud Graham Ramsue.

She was a graduate of West Rowan High School and later Salisbury Business College, where she received an associate degree in Business Administration. She retired from Denso, formerly known as ASMO. She was married to her loving husband, Robert Dewayne Scott, for 37 years. She loved going to church, singing and spending time with her family. She enjoyed watching her grandson grow. He was her pride and joy. She was an active member of One Accord Ministries.

In addition to her parents, she was preceded in death by two sisters, Mary Ann Ramsue and Rosea Mae Ramsue; a nephew, Jeffrey Allen Ramsey Jr.; father-in-law, Robert Louis Scott; mother-in-law, Dorothy Summers Scott; two sisters-in-law, Julie Ann Scott and Barbara Mae Scott; and one brother-in-law, Charles Anthony Scott.

She leaves behind to cherish the memories of her life her husband, Robert Dewayne Scott of the home; a daughter, Robinette (Fernando) Scott of the home; a grandson, Kairo Vasquez of the home; a sister, Lula Ramsue of North Carolina; four sisters-in-law, Francine McCullough, Robin Tomlin, Marilyn (Archie) Darty and Crystal Scott, all of North Carolina. She had several special friends; Wiletha Ward of North Carolina, Chief Apostle Kenneth Odom of North Carolina, Henry Williams of North Carolina, Elle Voss of Florida and Apostle Lawrence Kerns of North Carolina.

She had a host of nieces and nephews, including Crystal Ramsue, Charlene Ramsue, Tawanna Ramsue, Keesha Ramsue, Jasmine Ramsey, Chandra Ramsey, Cierra Ramsey, Destiny Brawley, James Ramsue, Christian Carson, Kendra Mayfield, Cameron Gaither, Caysen Dulin, Jaydah Mchaffey, Jeremiah Ramsey, Judah Mchaffey, Lawson Smith, James-Elijah Maddox Ramsue, and McKenna Skye Ramsue and many other extended family and friends.

Condolences may be sent to the family online at http://www.bunchjohnsonfuneralhome.com.
